venue_description: Old Salem Farm is a premier equestrian boarding and training facility in North Salem, New York. The leading competition venue has 66 permanent stalls and offers boarding, training, shows, sales and leases less than one hour north of New York Cityhttps://www.causeiq.com/organizations/old-salem-farm-foundation,450974587/#:~:text=Old%20Salem%20Farm%20is%20a,those%20interested%20in%20equestrian%20sports.

city_state: North Salem NY, North Salem NY

prompt-hotels: [{"TASK":"Curate hotel options for Old Salem Farm (venue_uid=osf-venue)","Location":"city: North Salem city_uid=north-salem, state:NY state_uid=ny.","GEO context":"lat=41.3480068, lon=-73.5940099 placeid=EisxOTAgSnVuZSBSZCAjMmMsIE5vcnRoIFNhbGVtLCBOWSAxMDU2MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgnts3KywqzCiREAj8ovU2u10RICMmM.","Official venue link":"https://oldsalemfarm.net/","Audience":"Competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit (trainers, grooms, show parents). Prioritize tight ring windows, early schooling, late features, and parking for trucks/trailers.","Tone":"Practical, insider, authoritative. Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, safety_notes, url"}]

data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "osf-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Old Salem Farm — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "North Salem’s Old Salem Farm is classic Northeast showground energy: rolling hills, immaculate rings, and tight, professional scheduling. Barns sit close to the in-gates so you can bounce between the warm-up ring and competition without losing your spot. Vendor row lines the main walkway for fast fixes, braiding supplies, and caffeine between trips. Expect clear jog strip procedures, efficient drags, and ring crews who keep things moving—ideal for riders juggling equitation, hunter derbies, and the GP ring on the same day.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Old Salem Farm",
    "North Salem NY horse shows",
    "hunter/jumper",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "derbies",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "A-circuit"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your week at Old Salem Farm",
  "section_img": "https://oldsalemfarm.net/wp-content/uploads/osf-venue.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Grand Prix field, warm-up, and stabling at Old Salem Farm in North Salem, New York",
  "section_link": "https://oldsalemfarm.net/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for Old Salem Farm: warm-up flow, jog strip details, vendor row access, and stabling tips for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Old Salem Farm — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Upbeat, practical notes on warm-up rings, the jog strip, vendor row, and stabling so you can move efficiently between trips at Old Salem.",
  "section_search_title": "Old Salem Farm Venue Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative, rider-focused overview of Old Salem with warm-up, jog strip, vendor row, and stabling tips for hunters, jumpers, and equitation.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for Show Week",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up rings: call your lines early and pass left-to-left; flat off-peak to avoid pre-eq crowding. Keep studs, spurs, and a spare stick in the ring bag.",
      "Jog strip: arrive polished and five minutes early; bridle number front and center. Wipe boots at the rail; keep a rag and hoof oil handy.",
      "Vendor row: along the main walkway near schooling—phone ahead for studs, spur straps, or last-minute braids. Grab coffee without losing earshot of in-gate calls.",
      "Stabling: aisles stay active—trunks flush, hoses coiled, fans secured. Lunging and hand-walking only in designated areas to keep traffic clear.",
      "Ring flow: hilltop layout means a little elevation—add a few minutes between the GP field and the sand rings when you’re stacked with back-to-backs.",
      "Footing & drags: efficient drags; check posted schooling windows after weather. Pack a cooler, towel, and rain shell for fast turnarounds.",
      "Logistics: golf carts and service vehicles share narrow lanes—slow at pinch points. Truck-in arrivals stage as posted; follow staff directions at the gate.",
      "Fuel: on-site concessions near vendor row; mobile-order when offered so you stay within call range of the in-gate."
    ]
  }
}

  "venue_uid": "osf-venue",

  "params": {
    "search_mode": "breakfast_only",

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Old Salem Farm","state_uid":["rechRMPXjOPMcuXJj"],"venue_official_link":"https://oldsalemfarm.net/","city_uid":["recUu7L5AAl4KUUzZ"],"placeId":"EisxOTAgSnVuZSBSZCAjMmMsIE5vcnRoIFNhbGVtLCBOWSAxMDU2MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgnts3KywqzCiREAj8ovU2u10RICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"190 June Rd, North Salem, NY 10560","venue_recordId":"recGae9TODVx1jeaX"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Old Salem Farm","state_uid":["rechRMPXjOPMcuXJj"],"venue_official_link":"https://oldsalemfarm.net/","city_uid":["recUu7L5AAl4KUUzZ"],"placeId":"EisxOTAgSnVuZSBSZCAjMmMsIE5vcnRoIFNhbGVtLCBOWSAxMDU2MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgnts3KywqzCiREAj8ovU2u10RICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"190 June Rd, North Salem, NY 10560","venue_recordId":"recGae9TODVx1jeaX"}]), Old Salem Farm represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 190 June Rd, North Salem, NY 10560, GEO context: lat=41.3480068, lon=-73.5940099 placeid=EisxOTAgSnVuZSBSZCAjMmMsIE5vcnRoIFNhbGVtLCBOWSAxMDU2MCwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgnts3KywqzCiREAj8ovU2u10RICMmM., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), New York-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Old Salem Farm in North Salem, NY is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: Old Salem Farm is a premier equestrian boarding and training facility in North Salem, New York. The leading competition venue has 66 permanent stalls and offers boarding, training, shows, sales and leases less than one hour north of New York Cityhttps://www.causeiq.com/organizations/old-salem-farm-foundation,450974587/#:~:text=Old%20Salem%20Farm%20is%20a,those%20interested%20in%20equestrian%20sports.
